state: Welcome to TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First off, if it's not too much trouble, I need you to go west. Following that, go south. If you can succeed at that, make an attempt to take a trip south. And then, make an attempt to go to the east. If you can finish that, make an attempt to go to the south. After that, travel south. Once you finish that, pick-up the sponge from the floor of the sauna. And once you've done that, you win! -= Bedroom =- You are in a bedroom. A standard kind of place. You can see a couch. Now why would someone leave that there? But the thing hasn't got anything on it. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded. > -= Bedroom =-0/1
next_state: -= Bathroom =- Look at you, bigshot, walking into a bathroom like it isn't some huge deal. You begin to take stock of what's in the room. You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a shelf. The shelf is typical. But there isn't a thing on it. There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked. > -= Bathroom =-0/2
